branchCategory.name: MGG
branchCategory.description: <p>Guided Cylinder series 90-MGG and 91-MGG are ideally suited for material handling applications involving stopping, lifting, and pushing. It combines the functions of a conventional cylinder, linear motion guide, and non-rotation device.&nbsp; Features include built-in shock absorbers, finite stroke adjustment, bumpers, and switch capability.&nbsp;90-MGG is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing. 91-MGG includes a "Lub-retainer" and is compatible with low dew point (40&deg;C) applications.</p>

branchItem.name: 90/91-MGGL, Guide Cylinder, Ball Bushing Bearing
branchItem.description: <p>Guided Cylinder series 90-MGG and 91-MGG are ideally suited for material handling applications involving stopping, lifting, and pushing. It combines the functions of a conventional cylinder, linear motion guide, and non-rotation device.  Features include built-in shock absorbers, finite stroke adjustment, bumpers, and switch capability. 90-MGG is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing. 91-MGG includes a "Lub-retainer" and is compatible with low dew point (40°C) applications.</p>
